education_text.0: Flowers gained full backing for his project from the director of the      Post Office Research Station Post Office Research Station at Dollis Hill, WIt was not until the 1970s that Flowers' work in computing was fully acknowledgedIn 1976, he published Introduction to Exchange Systems, a book on the engineering principles of telephone exchangesFlowers is commemorated at the      Post Office Research Station Post Office Research Station site, which became a housing development, with the main building converted into a block of flats and an access road called Flowers Close
